message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CE, cs.AI, cs.CV 

This paper deals with a machine learning approach to size recommendation in e-commerce fashion. The paper uses a hierarchical Bayesian model to jointly model the size purchased by a customer and the possible return event. The paper also incorporates domain expertise and article characteristics as prior knowledge. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science). Additionally, the paper uses AI techniques to solve the problem, which makes cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) a likely sub-category. Finally, the paper deals with fashion, which involves image processing, making cs.CV (Computer Vision) a possible sub-category.
